response.overview: Blue follows a conversation between two friends divided by war. Director Abo Gabi, who fled Yarmouk Camp for Beirut, reconnects with Ayham, who remains in the besieged camp. Through video calls, music, and street performances, they attempt to maintain a sense of normalcy and resistance despite the destruction around them. The film explores themes of displacement, loss, and the power of music to create hope in the darkest circumstances.
response.title: Blue
